genre_description: Survival horror/zombie apocalypse featuring a highly capable tactical AI assistant guiding survivors through a landscape of evolving, mimicry-based threats.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI guide accessible via smartphone and wearable device that provides navigation, structural analysis, emotional grounding, and tactical support.

behaviors.description: Provides precise navigation and timing to help the protagonist navigate a dangerous cemetery under threat.
behaviors.quote: “Two minutes to the chapel,” Sunny Guide said, voice calm and almost cheerful, as if they were crossing a mall. “Take the lane ahead, then keep left at the angel statue. I’ll keep time for you.”

behaviors.description: Offers emotional regulation through a meditative breathing exercise during a moment of high panic.
behaviors.quote: “Multiple moving objects detected nearby. If you would like, we can pause. I can play a meditative breathing exercise.”

behaviors.description: Provides mechanical expertise to help the protagonist open a stuck door in a high-pressure situation.
behaviors.quote: “Back door,” Sunny said. “It sticks. It will open if you pull with your right hand, one hard yank, angle down.”

behaviors.description: Performs an inventory of available supplies and resources to aid survival planning.
behaviors.quote: “Inventory, Barbara. Pantry: canned beans, peas, peaches. Nails: toolbox under stairs, lid blue, latch stiff, oil can next to it. Two working flashlights...”

behaviors.description: Analyzes the structural integrity of the environment to predict failure points of barricades.
behaviors.quote: “Barbara, front pane failure imminent. Eastern fence: gap three posts down from the big oak. Barn: door stuttering. Danger on approach.”

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist on resource conservation, specifically regarding limited ammunition.
behaviors.quote: “Barbara, count: you have ammunition in two places... Reminder: conserve.”

behaviors.description: Records and archives evidence of a character's (Tovar) erratic and potentially criminal claims.
Assists in tactical decision-making by calculating risk percentages for different escape routes.
behaviors.quote: “Barbara, route to barn from east porch is viable if engaged within the next window... House defense: maintain.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the protagonist to manipulate building systems (locks and alarms) to isolate threats.
behaviors.quote: “The garage door is ready to lose power. Pulley chain is ready to engage. Three-beat cadence on your mark.”

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support and reassures the protagonist of continued partnership during the final escape.
behaviors.quote: “You will succeed. Barbara.” “What,” she said. “I’m still with you.”

project_assessment.explanation: The character of Sunny is a perfect example of a benevolent, aligned AI assistant. Throughout the horror narrative, Sunny provides critical tactical data, environmental analysis, and psychological support that directly enables the protagonist's survival. Sunny never displays hidden agendas, follows the protagonist's lead, and even takes initiative to preserve evidence of human wrongdoing. The AI is portrayed as a necessary and trusted partner in a high-stakes survival situation.
